AddressInfo.Title: Laws Commercial Plaza
AddressInfo.AddressLine2: Lai Chi Kok, Cheung Sha Wan
AddressInfo.AccessComments: Be aware of TWO parking garage entries just next to each other, choose the FIRST one (Laws). See the picture I uploaded. Also be aware you need to keep left, into the off-side separate car lane, in order to access this place. Only one floor up, electric chargers are on the right side. Can be hard to access, especially with a Tesla Model S. NOTE: Requires EV-link

GeneralComments: 32A single phase charging, 3.5 times faster than the usual 13A BS1363. Requires EV-link chip to activate. You need your own Type-2 cable (the thick blue cable that comes with Tesla Model S), and it will lock in the charging station as well - requires the EV-link to unlock the cable again (or using the E-charge app from HK EVpower. Parking is 16HKD/hr on weekdays, 13HKD/h on weekends and public holidays. With 32A charging, it's worth it, take a walk to the Lai Chi Kok MTR near by and leave the car charging while doing your business, charging at around 32 km/h (Tesla Model S). Staff seem very focused on the chargers not being blocked by ICE cars, not even by an EV NOT charging. I wasn't even done parking when a staff member came to ask 1) are you parking and 2) will you be charging.
